misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a unique blend of power and precision to the greens. Representing St. Laurence Golf, Jussi is known for his aggressive play style, often shaping his shots into a formidable power draw that can leave opponents scrambling.

Beyond his technical skills, Jussi is known for his calm and collected demeanor under pressure. His capacity to remain unfazed by the intensity of the competition has earned him the respect of his peers and fans alike.

With four past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jussi is still looking for his first victory in the competition. Despite not yet lifting the coveted trophy, his consistent performance and unwavering dedication make him a player to watch.
While he will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, Jussi remains an active member of the Hector Trophée community, and a future return to competition is not out of the question.
